channel.title: Porting on Coding Architect
channel.description: Recent content in Porting on Coding Architect

item.title: Lab notebook: Porting 550K LoC of C/C++ from Windows to Linux
item.description: As a part of Native Cloud transformation at my work I’ve ported a financial library from Windows to Linux. The library consists of 250K LoC of C and 300K LoC of C++.
